Text: GetSmart Visa Dont Wait Another SecondIMAGE You are receiving this message as a valued member of the itsImazing Network This special offer message is powered by TargitInteractive an ItsImazing affiliate partner IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE The introductory rate on purchases is for or billing periods after account opening depending upon the account for which you qualify For more complete pricing information see important Terms and Conditions for GetSmart SM Visa You must be a US resident and at least years of age to apply This offer may not be available to current Providian credit card customers and employees of Providian The GetSmart Visa card is currently available in all US states except Wisconsin If you previously asked to be excluded from GetSmart or Providian product offerings and solicitations they apologize for this email Every effort was made to ensure that you were excluded from this email However if GetSmart does not have your current email address in their database they were unable to prevent this email from reaching you If you do not wish to receive promotional email from GetSmart please click here and let us know Providian National Bank Member FDIC Providian Bank Member FDIC Thank you Providian Financial Corporation All Rights Reserved If you would like to optout of TargitInteractive please click here
